Defensive.Name: Regeneration
Defensive.Description: Restores 2% of your maximum health at the end of your turn.

Defensive.Name: Barrier
Defensive.Description: Grants a shield that absorbs 15% of your maximum health for 3 turns.

Offensive.Name: Flaming
Offensive.Description: Adds fire damage equal to 10% of your attack power.

Offensive.Name: Freezing
Offensive.Description: Adds ice damage equal to 10% of your attack power.

Offensive.Name: Poisonous
Offensive.Description: Adds poison damage equal to 5% of your attack power over 3 turns.

Utility.Name: Swift
Utility.Description: Increases your speed by 15% making your next turn arrive faster.

Utility.Name: Precise
Utility.Description: Increases your critical hit chance by 5%.

Utility.Name: Vampiric
Utility.Description: Heals you for 5% of the damage you deal.

Utility.Name: Lucky
Utility.Description: Increases your loot drop rate by 10%.
